title: Problems with reinstaling LoL
body:
Hi.
So i had LoL client bugs , and i couldnt really do anything , and i thought reinstaling LoL will be ok , but when i deleted LoL ,  and tried to install it back again , it just says - "Warning 2330. Erorr getting file atributes C:/User/LionWardz/appdata/local/temp/directx_setup.GetLastError: 1392.
Can someone help me?

replies.body: Is this a new rig or reformat, and if so have you updated Windows  yet?  Did you mean error 1932, or was it 1392?  Would you be able to grab a screenshot?  Would love to help, just need some more details.  Let me know!
